prologue-text:
Rogue House: Prologue It all starts somewhere... ...as you approach the mysterious rift, a new creature appears before you. It swings its twisted metal arm, catching you by surprise. Quickly, you push the creature away. There is blood. Your blood, and lots of it. You stumble through the rift... Gasping, holding yourself together, you watch the rift close. "...what in the world..." the creature nowhere to be seen. The light fades, a cold feeling washes over you... You wake up in a strange bed, in a strange place... Daelynn: "Well, look who's finally awake. You've been out for a few days. You don't remember what happened? Some concerned folk found you in the forest, wounded and unconscious. And just in time, too! Said they could hear the howling of wolves approaching." "Brought you back here to get you patched up, although it looked pretty grim. Wasn't sure you were gonna make it but you pulled through! Now that you're here, you best be Respectful. We won't be having any Theft or Fighting around here." "Have a look around, get your barrings. Maybe grab a drink at the Rogue House Tavern, just up the path. Oh! And don't go alone... Take this!" (Use /starterkit to receive your gift)
"Welcome to Rogue House."
roguehouseguide-text:
Rogue House Community Server Guide Your Journey Begins... Join the Discord! - Vintage Story Wiki Rogue House VS is a Long Term Survival Building experience. PvE is enabled. Food spoils. Months are long (60 days). Rifts appear, allowing surface drifters. Temporal storms can blow through. Wolves are not friendly. Meteors can come crashing down, destroying unprotected blocks while depositing some ore.
Mods selected and tweaks made to enhance the Immersive Survival vision of owner, RogueRaiden. Starter Guide - Progression Guide - Claims Guide - Chat Group Guide Settings:
-Slightly Reduced Hunger Speed
-Half Reduced Food Spoilage
-Base HP Set to 20
-Aggression Enabled
-Items Drop on Death
-60 Days per Month
-Calender Paused When Empty
-Chiseling for Most Blocks
-Rifts Enabled
-Rare Temporal Storms
-Temporal Stability Enabled
-Underground Farming Enabled
-Proximity Chat Tab for RP
-General Chat Linked to Discord RogueRaiden: Server Owner & Builder Morwen: Server Mod & Builder DiZz: Server Mod & Builder Patreon - Twitch.tv/RogueRaiden - Toss a coin to your Raiden~
